Verses: 1 sirumaippattavanmel Sindhaiyullavan Baakkiyavaan; Theengunaalil Karththar Avanai Viduvippaar.
2 karththar Avanaip Paadhukaaththu Avanai Uyirode Vaippaar; Boomiyil Avan Baakkiyavaanaayiruppaan; Avan Saththurukkalin Ishtaththirku Neer Avanai Oppukkodeer.
3 padukkaiyinmel Viyaadhiyaaikkidakkira Avanaik Karththar Thaanguvaar; Avanudaiya Viyaadhiyile Avan Padukkai Muzhuvadhaiyum Maatrippoduveer.
4 karththaave, Enmel Irakkamaayirum; Umakku Virodhamaaip Paavanjeydhen, En Aaththumaavaik Gunamaakkum Endru Naan Sonnen.
5 avan Eppozhudhu Saavaan, Avan Per Eppozhudhu Azhiyum? Endru En Saththurukkal Enakku Virodhamaaich Sollugiraargal.
6 oruvan Ennaip Paarkkavandhaal Vanjanaiyaaip Pesugiraan; Avan Than Irudhayaththil Akkiramaththaich Segariththukkondu, Theruvilepoi, Adhaith Thootrugiraan.
7 en Pagaignarellaarum Enmel Egamaai Munumunuththu, Enakku Virodhamaayirundhu, Enakkup Pollaangu Ninaiththu,
8 theeraaviyaadhi Avanaip Pidiththukkondadhu; Padukkaiyil Kidakkira Avan Ini Ezhundhiruppadhillai Engiraargal.
9 en Piraanasinegidhanum, Naan Nambinavanum, En Appam Pusiththavanumaagiya Manushanum, Enmel Than Kudhikaalaith Thookkinaan.
10 karththaave, Neer Enakku Irangi, Naan Avargalukkuch Sarikkatta Ennai Ezhundhirukkappannum.
11 en Saththuru Enmel Jeyankollaadhadhinaal, Neer Enmel Piriyamaayirukkireerendru Ariven.
12 neer En Uththamaththile Ennaiththaangi, Endrendraikkum Ummudaiya Samugaththil Ennai Nilainiruththuveer.
13 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Anaadhiyaai Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalilum Sthoththirikkappadaththakkavar. Aamen, Aamen.
